ygData.subject: Re: Time for another Sylly Survey
ygData.msgSnippet: When playing your bard in Norrath what is your favorite: Day of the week to play:  Sunday, Monday, and whenever my wife is away. ( Honey, Do you know how I got
ygData.messageBody:
When playing your bard in Norrath what is your favorite:

Day of the week to play: Sunday, Monday, and whenever my wife is away.
("Honey, Do you know how I got signed up for three bowling leagues?")

Time of day: 7pm - 12am Central Time, if I play responsibly <cough>

Longest stretch of continuous play: 12 hours.

Way to have game sounds: High enough to actually hear the Bellow. Still
working on it ("Honey, what's this receipt for a 500W amp?")

Distance to sit from display: 2 ft. Closer when I lean in to look around
corners.

TV show to have on: VH1's Behind the Music. Did you know some of those guys
have drug problems?

Music to listen to: Enya, Celtic harp, concert band classical and jazz,
Sting, Metallica, Rush. (What, no opera??)

Beverage (non-alcoholic): water

Beverage (alcoholic): Killian's Red (rarely)

Health Food: bread to go with the water. I suffer for my EQ.

Junk Food: the occasional Dum Dum sucker. I've actually lost weight since
starting EQ. Who has time to eat?

Clothes to wear: Start with dress shirt, tie, dockers (who changes BEFORE
they get their first kill?). Eventually end up in sweats and slippers (it's
cold up here in MinneSOTa).

Operaman
Meandering Maestro
Innoruuk
